resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107541</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107541</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212231</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sport Science</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sport-Wissenschaft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science de Sport</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência Do Esporte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza Di Sport</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αθλητική επιστήμη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia Del Deporte</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Olympians continually search for ways to improve their athletic performance, trying to improve technique, mental preparation and rest. How do elite athletes use science to maximize their performance? How does exercise affect the body? And what do we know about the original Olympic games?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Olympiere suchen fortwährend nach Methoden, ihre 
athletische Leistung zu verbessern und versuchen, Technik, 
Geistesvorbereitung und Rest zu verbessern. Wie verwenden 
Ausleseathleten Wissenschaft, um ihre Leistung zu maximieren? 
Wie beeinflußt Übung den Körper? Und was kennen wir 
über die ursprünglichen olympischen Spiele?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Olympiens recherchent continuellement des 
voies d'améliorer leur exécution sportive, essayant d'améliorer la 
technique, la préparation mentale et le repos. Comment les 
athlètes d'élite emploient-ils la science pour maximiser leur 
exécution ? Comment l'exercice affecte-t-il le corps ? Et
que connaissons-nous les jeux olympiques initiaux ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os olympians procuraram continuamente por maneiras
melhorar seu desempenho atlético, tentando melhorar a técnica, a 
preparação mental e o descanso. Como os atletas do elite usam 
a ciência maximize seu desempenho? Como o exercício afeta o 
corpo? E que nós sabemos sobre os jogos olympic originais?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I olympians cercano continuamente i modi 
migliorare le loro prestazioni atletiche, provando a migliorare la 
tecnica, la preparazione mentale ed il resto. Come gli atleti 
dell'elite usano la scienza per elevare le loro prestazioni? 
Come l'esercitazione interessa il corpo? E che cosa 
conosciamo circa i giochi olimpici originali?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναζήτηση Olympians συνεχώς των τρόπων να βελτιωθεί
η αθλητική απόδοσή τους, που προσπαθεί να βελτιώσει την τεχνική,
τη διανοητικά προετοιμασία και το υπόλοιπο. Πώς οι αθλητές 
ελίτ χρησιμοποιούν την επιστήμη για να μεγιστοποιήσουν την 
απόδοσή τους; Πώς η άσκηση έχει επιπτώσεις στο σώμα; 
Και τι ξέρουμε για τους αρχικούς ολυμπιακούς αγώνες;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los olympians buscan continuamente para maneras de
mejorar su funcionamiento atlético, intentando mejorar técnica, la 
preparación mental y el resto. ¿Cómo los atletas de la élite 
utilizan ciencia para maximizar su funcionamiento? ¿Cómo el 
ejercicio afecta el cuerpo? ¿Y qué sabemos sobre los juegos 
olímpicos originales?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:DAVID TENENBAUM
FN:DAVID TENENBAUM
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212231</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107541</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/sport-science</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
